item.title: Using Azure Machine Learning Studio and Azure OpenAI service
item.description: Deploy realtime endpoint to Azure Machine Learning Studio Follow this tutorial: https://microsoftlearning.github.io/mslearn-ai-fundamentals/Instructions/Labs/01-machine-learning.html Cần add Role assignment cho RG: Solution: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/2044338/cant-run-real-time-deployment-for-best-model-in-az Deploy lại lần nữa: Deploy success Real-time Endpoint: Deploy and use Azure OpenAI Chat gặp lỗi:
